RTCRtpScriptTransformerReadable.summary: The readable read-only property of the interface returns a instance is a source for encoded media frames.

remarks.para:
When the corresponding is inserted into the WebRTC sender and receiver pipelines, this stream may be enqueued with outgoing or incoming encoded media frames ( or ).
A WebRTC encoded transform can read the frames, modify them as needed, and then send them back into the WebRTC pipeline by writing them to .
A common way to perform this operation is to pipe the frames through a .
